Class MoveBackup

java.lang.Object
com.github.bhlangonijr.chesslib.MoveBackup
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardEvent
public class MoveBackup extends Object implements BoardEvent
A structure that can be used to cancel the effects of a move and to restore the board to a previous status. The board context is memorized at the backup is created, and it could be subsequently re-applied to the sourcing board.

The move backup is also a BoardEvent, and hence it can be passed to the observers of the BoardEventType.ON_UNDO_MOVE events, emitted when a move is reverted on a board.

  • Constructor Details

    • MoveBackup

      public MoveBackup()
      Constructs a new empty move backup.

    • MoveBackup

      public MoveBackup(Board board, Move move)
      Constructs a new move backup taking a board and a move. At the same time, it both instantiates the data structure and takes a snapshot of the board status for a later restore.
      Parameters:
      board - the board that describes the status at the time of the move
      move - the move which could be potentially restored later in time

  • Method Details

    • makeBackup

      public void makeBackup(Board board, Move move)
      Initiates a new move backup, possibly overwriting any previously existing backup.
      Parameters:
      board - the board that describes the status at the time of the move
      move - the move which could be potentially restored later in time

    • restore

      public void restore(Board board)
      Restores the previously stored status backup to the board passed as an argument, effectively cancelling the consequences of the move memorized at the time the backup was created, as well as any potential move executed on the board after that moment.

      It is a responsibility of the caller to make sure the board used for creating the backup is also the board passed in input to this method. No check is performed to prevent another board is used instead.

      Parameters:
      board - the board to be restored to a previous status

      the next side to move

    • getEnPassantTarget

      public Square getEnPassantTarget()
      Returns the target square of an en passant capture used for restoring the board.
      Returns:
      the en passant target square, or Square.NONE if en passant was not possible at the time the backup was created

    • getRookCastleMove

      public Move getRookCastleMove()
      Returns the rook move to apply in order to revert a castle move in the case a board has to be restored.
      Returns:
      the rook move to apply to revert a castle move, or null if the move to revert is not a castle move
